user_query: My company is planning a business trip to San Francisco and we need the address information for the postal code 94111. Additionally, we would like to know the nearest cities to San Francisco for accommodation options. Can you provide us with the details of the nearest 3 cities and their distances from San Francisco? Lastly, please fetch the timezone information for San Francisco to ensure we have accurate local time during our trip.

TaskList.description: Get address information for the postal code 94111 in San Francisco.
Find the nearest cities to San Francisco for accommodation options.
Fetch the timezone information for San Francisco.
